thread.section_title: Bike24 Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Bike24 | www.bike24.net
thread.title: Julien

author: Julien
title: Julien
text:
I ordered some equipment before a 3 week ski trip. One week after giving the order, the products where still not dispatched.
I contacted the customer service by email. For each email, it took 2 to 3 days to get an answer, with no helpful answer.
I finally called them but, same situation, they didn't offer any solution.
Will not order with bike24.com again, customer experience was not good.
